## RoseParams.backgroundColor property

Gauge background color - default: `steelseries.BackgroundColor.DARK_GRAY`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
backgroundColor?: ss.BackgroundColor;
```

## Remarks

ignored if [backgroundVisible](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.backgroundvisible.md) = `false`
